TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebHttpBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior

summary.span: 为 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务启用 Web 编程模型。

span.span: Enables the Web programming model for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与绑定结合使用时，该行为 使 WCF 能够公开和访问 Web 样式服务。The behavior, when used in conjunction with the binding, enables WCF to expose and access Web style services. 自动将此行为添加到使用的终结点 。 automatically adds this behavior to endpoints that use the .

span.span: An instance of that contains the operation selector for the specified endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据统一资源标识符（URI）后缀和使用的 HTTP 方法，映射对 WCF 服务操作的调用。The maps calls to WCF service operations based on the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) suffix and the HTTP method used. 它是派生行为可用于提供其自身的 （将传入 HTTP 请求映射到服务操作）的实现的可扩展点。This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of that maps the incoming HTTP request to a service operation.

span.span: The service operation.

summary.span: 获取查询字符串转换器。

span.span: Gets the query string converter.
A instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它是派生行为可用于提供其自身的 （可在服务操作参数类型和 HTTP 请求 URL 的查询字符串之间进行转换）的实现的扩展点。This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of that can convert the service operation parameter types to and from the HTTP request URL's query string.

span.span: The service operation.
The service endpoint.

summary.span: 获取指定服务操作和终结点的客户端上的请求格式化程序。

span.span: Gets the request formatter on the client for the specified service operation and endpoint.

returns.span: 一个对指定操作和终结点的客户端上的请求格式化程序的 引用。

span.span: An reference to the request formatter on the client for the specified operation and endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它是派生行为可用于提供其自身的 （可调用以将服务操作调用的输入参数转换为请求消息）的实现的扩展点。This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of that is called to convert the input parameters of the service operation call to a request message. 必须将服务操作的 中指定的参数序列化为请求消息的 `To` URI，并且必须将其他参数序列化为请求消息的正文。Parameters specified in the of the service operation must be serialized to the `To` URI of the request message and other parameters must be serialized to the body of the request message.

The service endpoint.

returns.span: 一个对指定操作和终结点的服务上的请求格式化程序的 引用。

span.span: An reference to the request formatter on the service for the specified operation and endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它是派生行为可用于提供其自身的 （可调用以从请求消息反序列化服务操作的输入参数）的实现的扩展点。This is an extensibility point that derived behaviors can use to supply their own implementation of that is called to deserialize the input parameters of the service operation from the request message. 必须将服务操作的 中指定的参数反序列化为请求消息的 `To` URI，并且必须将其他参数反序列化为请求消息的正文。Parameters specified in the of the service operation must be deserialized from the `To` URI of the request message and other parameters must be deserialized from the body of the request message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 WCF REST 帮助页的详细信息，请参阅[Wcf WEB HTTP 服务帮助页](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-service-help-page)。For more information about the WCF REST Help page, see [WCF Web HTTP Service Help Page](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-service-help-page). 在配置文件中启用 helpEnabled 特性：To enable the helpEnabled attribute in a configuration file: ``` ``` 以编程方式启用 HelpEnabled 属性：To programmatically enable the HelpEnabled property: ``` WebHttpBehavior helpBehavior = new WebHttpBehavior(); helpBehavior.HelpEnabled = true; host.Description.Endpoints[0].Behaviors.Add(helpBehavior); ```

span.span: The service endpoint.

summary.span: 确认终结点符合 Web 编程模型的需求。

span.span: Confirms that the endpoint meets the requirements for the Web programming model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证以下内容：Verifies the following: - 终结点不为 `null`。The endpoint is not `null`. - 终结点使用 HTTP 或 HTTPS 方案。The endpoint uses the HTTP or HTTPS schemes. - 绑定的 设置为 。The of the binding is set to . - 绑定包含一个 ，其中， 设置为 `true`。The binding contains an where is set to `true`. - 在 中指定的参数必须为操作的一部分。The parameters specified in the must be part of the operation. - 指定 的操作最多包含一个输入参数，且不能包含 out 参数。Operations that specify have, at most, one input parameter and can have no out parameters.
